ygData.subject: Poll results & other
ygData.msgSnippet: Interesting.  Only 5 have voted.  I guess that means that in all of the membership of this list, only 5 are truly devoted. Other - This are small suggestions:

Interesting.  Only 5 have voted.  I guess that means that in all of 
the membership of this list, only 5 are truly devoted.

Other - This are small suggestions:  

give mages the ability to slow down time for times as an alternate to 
freezing time.  that way you could still generate energy to use while 
fighting opponents.

Another suggestion would be adding a new character class:  a
character 
that can duplicate the specials of other characters, both friend and 
foe on the battlefield.  The only exception would be it can not 
duplicate slimes's ability.  That would make the game more 
interesting.

Also, can you give faeries the ability to carry other characters 
across distances?

Can you give mages the ability to create teleporters to spots where 
whey have laid a teleport marker?
